text: Miloš Vučević (, ; born 10 December 1974) is a Serbian lawyer and politician serving as the Prime Minister of Serbia since May 2024. He was the deputy prime minister of Serbia and minister of defence from 2022 to 2024. He was the mayor of Novi Sad from 2012 to 2022. On 28 January 2025, Vučević resigned after mass protests regarding the Novi Sad railway station canopy collapse. He remains in acting capacity until the National Assembly accepts his resignation. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Serbia Category:Current national leaders
title: Miloš Vučević
